content.rendered:
We Advocate For Victims Of Misdiagnosed Heart Attacks

When a heart attack is diagnosed and treated promptly in its early stages, the patient may make a full recovery and go on to live a normal life.

However, when the misdiagnosis of a heart attack occurs, particularly in an emergency room setting, or when a medical professional fails to diagnose a heart attack altogether, the results can be catastrophic. For some people, the delayed or missed diagnosis of a heart attack may prove to be fatal.

Representing Victims Of Medical Malpractice For 50 Years

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our Columbus, Ohio, attorneys have been representing the victims of medical malpractice and their family members for 50 years.

Our lawyers have extensive experience handling misdiagnosed and wrongful death cases.

We will thoroughly investigate the situation that harmed you or your loved one and identify the responsible parties. We understand that there is nothing that can make up for your loss. However, we can work hard to hold the doctor or hospital accountable and help you recover the compensation you deserve.

Contact Our Attorneys Today

If you or a loved one has been harmed as the result of a misdiagnosed heart attack, you may be entitled to financial compensation.

Call 614-360-2706 today, or email us to set up a free consult. We can discuss the specifics of your case and legal recourse options available.

We provide contingency fee arrangements so you pay nothing upfront.
